meanings.sent1: The caterpillar was the wriggliest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The snake in the garden was the wriggliest creature I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The wriggliest puppy in the litter kept escaping from its pen.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as wriggly as the wriggliest worm.
meanings.sent5: The wriggliest path through the forest led to a hidden waterfall.

meanings.sent1: The fish in the pond was the wriggliest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The toddler was the wriggliest during playtime.
meanings.sent3: The wriggliest spaghetti I ever cooked slipped out of the pot.
meanings.sent4: The vines in the jungle were as wriggly as the wriggliest snake.
meanings.sent5: The wriggliest dance move she did made everyone laugh.
